name: Capsule Quest (Rogue Goose)
description:
A short but challenging platformer with ambient music to put your skills to the test!

Follow the adventure of a capsule trying to escape the platforming dimension and achieve jumping mastery by reaching the finish line.

Controls:

W - Move Forward, S - Move Backward

A - Move Left, D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

Mouse - Move Camera

Music by Abstraction

http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

See Credits for specific songs
